DOC.brief_summary: Objectives Study : The primary objective study evaluate relative merit , safety effectiveness tailor TIF2 procedure treat GERD patient persistent GERD symptom despite PPI therapy . The secondary objective study evaluate effectiveness tailor TIF procedure restore antireflux barrier eliminate GE reflux . Type Study : Prospective , non-randomized , uncontrolled Study Duration 12 month Number Patients 20 Inclusion Criteria : Age 18-70 year , daily PPIs > 6 month , persistent GERD symptom despite PPI therapy , anatomic disruption gastroesophageal valve Hill Grade II-III , evidence one follow PPI therapy : ( 1 ) erosive esophagitis ( erosion ulceration endoscopy ) ; ( 2 ) abnormal ambulatory pH study ; ( 3 ) biopsy confirm change characteristic reflux esophagitis ; acceptable esophageal motility ( either manometry video esophagogram ) , hiatal hernia large 2 cm , patient willing cooperate post-operative dietary recommendation assessment test , sign informed consent Exclusion Criteria : BMI > 40 , hiatal hernia > 2 cm , esophagitis grade D , esophageal ulcer , fix esophageal stricture , gastric motility disorder , previous splenectomy , pregnancy ( female ) , immunosuppression , ASA > 2 , portal hypertension and/or varix , history previous resective gastric esophageal surgery , cervical spine fusion , Zenker 's diverticulum , esophageal epiphrenic diverticulum , achalasia , scleroderma dermatomyositis , eosinophilic esophagitis , cirrhosis , active gastro-duodenal ulcer disease , gastric outlet obstruction stenosis , gastroparesis delay gastric emptying , coagulation disorder Interventions : Treatment : Tailored transoral incisionless fundoplication ( TIF2 ) use EsophyX system SerosaFuse fastener ( EndoGastric Solutions , Inc. , Redmond , WA , USA ) Evaluation Criteria : Primary Outcome Measure 24 hour pH impedance study : change Johnson DeMeester score ; GERD-HRQOL score Secondary Outcome Measures PPI usage , GERD symptoms 6 12 month vs. baseline PPI 's , total number reflux episode , Symptom Association Probability PPI . Safety : Adverse event map standard term report .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Effectiveness Tailored Transoral Incisionless Fundoplication ( TIF ) Using EsophyX Treatment GERD
